description: This file defines a linked list data structure with standard operations such as add, remove, size, and get. It includes an internal Node class and utility functions, encapsulated within the LinkedList class.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: Implements a singly linked list with methods to add, remove by element, get size, and access elements by index.

classes.name: LinkedList.Node
classes.description: Internal class representing a node in the linked list holding string data.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Private helper method to detach a node from the list.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Companion object method to find the last node in the list from the head.
